name: Great mobile game - Flying Pat (Canceled)
blurb: We decided to make a game called FlyingPat and we think that is the coolest project on the planet earth :) For Android/iOS/Windows

rewards.reward: A hug from Flying Pat member should you ever meet them in person. Our eternal thanks!

A copy of the game on all available systems, by digital download. (iOS / Android / Windows Phone.) You may download a copy for each system.\r\n\u2666 Coins in the amount of $50 + unlocked GOD mode \u2666 Name added to in-game credits!

CHARACTER ART CARDS \u2013 10 original character designs. Monkey, penguin, dog - Pat, helicopter and many more! Printed on 5x7 inch heavy matte paper. Archival. Perfect for collecting or sending Holiday wishes to friends! New characters posted in daily Kickstarter updates \u2013 keep watching to see them all! To add these to your current pledge, just add $20. \r\nFree shipping to the U.S. \u2666 A copy of the game on all available systems \u2666 Coins in the amount of $50 \u2666 unlocked GOD mode \u2666 Name added to in-game credits!

BETA TESTER - Enter the inner circle! Access to every version of the game until the launch. Your suggestions will be considered throughout the development process. \u2666 PLUS your name in the credits!  \u2666 A copy of the game on all available systems + Coins in the amount of $50 \u2666 unlocked GOD mode

SUPER FLYING PAT T-SHIRT! Printed on fine T-shirt material. After the campaign ends, we'll send a survey where you can choose the colour (red, blue, green or yellow), cut (men's/women's) and size (S~XXXL). To combine this reward with any other level, just add $30 to your pledge. Free shipping to the U.S.\u2666 A copy of the game on all available systems + Coins in the amount of $50 + unlocked GOD mode\r\nProduct image for illustration purposes only. Actual product may vary.

Build your OWN level with us!! That\u2019s right, you will build your own level with us, but with our limitations!! \u2666 PLUS Beta Tester. \u2666  PLUS your name in the credits!  \u2666 PLUS A copy of the game on all available systems \u2666 Coins in the amount of $50 \u2666 unlocked GOD mode\r\nIn the construction of your level, we will work together over the Internet. You will have a great deal of flexibility in the arrangement of elements, such as rocks, coins, obstacles - fireballs, trees and caves. However, all of these elements will be made in advance. You will feel like a sort of an editor, where we will build a level together! Of course, certain restrictions exist as concerns the size of levels, the number of transports and the positioning of your level in the game. We are confident that this will be a great experience and an insight into how games are actually created.\r\nName added to in-game credits!

Choose your own NPC character with our limitations. You will be saving these two animals in the third stage \u2013 desert \u2013 and fourth stage \u2013 lava. The condition is that THE ANIMALS ARE compatible with the environment and that they are spherical in shape! \u2666 PLUS a SUPER FLYING PAT T-SHIRT. \u2666 PLUS FIRST EDITION SUPER FLYING PAT 3D PRINT \u2666 PLUS your name in the credits!  \u2666 A copy of the game on all available systems \u2666 Coins in the amount of $50 \u2666 unlocked GOD mode. \u2666 BETA TESTER \u2666 Build your own level \u2666 Name added to in-game credits!
